description: Describes the given custom connector registered in your Amazon Web Services account. This API can be used for custom connectors that are registered in your account and also for Amazon authored connectors.

parameters.name: connectorType
parameters.description: The connector type, such as CUSTOMCONNECTOR, Saleforce, Marketo. Please choose CUSTOMCONNECTOR for Lambda based custom connectors.

nested_items.name: connectorConfiguration
nested_items.description: Configuration info of all the connectors that the user requested.

nested_items.name: canUseAsSource
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the connector can be used as a source.

nested_items.name: canUseAsDestination
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the connector can be used as a destination.

nested_items.name: supportedDestinationConnectors
nested_items.description: Lists the connectors that are available for use as destinations.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedSchedulingFrequencies
nested_items.description: Specifies the supported flow frequency for that connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: isPrivateLinkEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies if PrivateLink is enabled for that connector.

nested_items.name: isPrivateLinkEndpointUrlRequired
nested_items.description: Specifies if a PrivateLink endpoint URL is required.

nested_items.name: supportedTriggerTypes
nested_items.description: Specifies the supported trigger types for the flow.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: connectorMetadata
nested_items.description: Specifies connector-specific metadata such as oAuthScopes, supportedRegions, privateLinkServiceUrl, and so on.

nested_items.name: Amplitude
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Amplitude.

nested_items.name: Dynatrace
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Dynatrace.

nested_items.name: GoogleAnalytics
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Google Analytics.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The desired authorization scope for the Google Analytics account.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: InforNexus
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Infor Nexus.

nested_items.name: Salesforce
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Salesforce.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The desired authorization scope for the Salesforce account.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dataTransferApis
nested_items.description: The Salesforce APIs that you can have Amazon AppFlow use when your flows transfers data to or from Salesforce.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: oauth2GrantTypesSupported
nested_items.description: The OAuth 2.0 grant types that Amazon AppFlow can use when it requests an access token from Salesforce. Amazon AppFlow requires an access token each time it attempts to access your Salesforce records.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ServiceNow
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to ServiceNow.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The desired authorization scope for the Slack account.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Snowflake
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Snowflake.

nested_items.name: supportedRegions
nested_items.description: Specifies the supported Amazon Web Services Regions when using Snowflake.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Trendmicro
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Trend Micro.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The desired authorization scope for the Zendesk account.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: EventBridge
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Amazon EventBridge.

nested_items.name: CustomerProfiles
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Amazon Connect Customer Profiles.

nested_items.name: Honeycode
nested_items.description: The connector metadata specific to Amazon Honeycode.

nested_items.name: oAuthScopes
nested_items.description: The desired authorization scope for the Amazon Honeycode account.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: connectorType
nested_items.description: The connector type.

nested_items.name: connectorLabel
nested_items.description: The label used for registering the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorDescription
nested_items.description: A description about the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorOwner
nested_items.description: The owner who developed the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorName
nested_items.description: The connector name.

nested_items.name: connectorVersion
nested_items.description: The connector version.

nested_items.name: connectorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the registered connector.

nested_items.name: connectorModes
nested_items.description: The connection modes that the connector supports.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: authenticationConfig
nested_items.description: The authentication config required for the connector.

nested_items.name: isBasicAuthSupported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether basic authentication is supported by the connector.

nested_items.name: isApiKeyAuthSupported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether API key authentication is supported by the connector.

nested_items.name: isOAuth2Supported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether OAuth 2.0 authentication is supported by the connector.

nested_items.name: isCustomAuthSupported
nested_items.description: Indicates whether custom authentication is supported by the connector.

nested_items.name: oAuth2Defaults
nested_items.description: Contains the default values required for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: oauthScopes
nested_items.description: OAuth 2.0 scopes that the connector supports.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: tokenUrls
nested_items.description: Token URLs that can be used for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: authCodeUrls
nested_items.description: Auth code URLs that can be used for OAuth 2.0 authentication.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: oauth2GrantTypesSupported
nested_items.description: OAuth 2.0 grant types supported by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: oauth2CustomProperties
nested_items.description: List of custom parameters required for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key of the custom parameter required for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: isRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the custom parameter for OAuth 2.0 authentication is required.

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: The label of the custom parameter used for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description about the custom parameter used for OAuth 2.0 authentication.

nested_items.name: isSensitiveField
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this authentication custom parameter is a sensitive field.

nested_items.name: connectorSuppliedValues
nested_items.description: Contains default values for this authentication parameter that are supplied by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Indicates whether custom parameter is used with TokenUrl or AuthUrl.

nested_items.name: customAuthConfigs
nested_items.description: Contains information required for custom authentication.

nested_items.name: customAuthenticationType
nested_items.description: The authentication type that the custom connector uses.

nested_items.name: authParameters
nested_items.description: Information about authentication parameters required for authentication.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The authentication key required to authenticate with the connector.

nested_items.name: isRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this authentication parameter is required.

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: Label used for authentication parameter.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description about the authentication parameter.

nested_items.name: isSensitiveField
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this authentication parameter is a sensitive field.

nested_items.name: connectorSuppliedValues
nested_items.description: Contains default values for this authentication parameter that are supplied by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: connectorRuntimeSettings
nested_items.description: The required connector runtime settings.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: Contains value information about the connector runtime setting.

nested_items.name: dataType
nested_items.description: Data type of the connector runtime setting.

nested_items.name: isRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this connector runtime setting is required.

nested_items.name: label
nested_items.description: A label used for connector runtime setting.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description about the connector runtime setting.

nested_items.name: scope
nested_items.description: Indicates the scope of the connector runtime setting.

nested_items.name: connectorSuppliedValueOptions
nested_items.description: Contains default values for the connector runtime setting that are supplied by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedApiVersions
nested_items.description: A list of API versions that are supported by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedOperators
nested_items.description: A list of operators supported by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedWriteOperations
nested_items.description: A list of write operations supported by the connector.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: connectorProvisioningType
nested_items.description: The provisioning type used to register the connector.

nested_items.name: connectorProvisioningConfig
nested_items.description: The configuration required for registering the connector.

nested_items.name: lambdaArn
nested_items.description: Lambda ARN of the connector being registered.

nested_items.name: logoURL
nested_items.description: Logo URL of the connector.

nested_items.name: registeredAt
nested_items.description: The date on which the connector was registered.

nested_items.name: registeredBy
nested_items.description: Information about who registered the connector.

nested_items.name: supportedDataTransferTypes
nested_items.description: The data transfer types that the connector supports.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: supportedDataTransferApis
nested_items.description: The APIs of the connector application that Amazon AppFlow can use to transfer your data.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the connector application API.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: You can specify one of the following types:
